description.value:
This @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Lantern (Bull's Eye)] is wrapped in decrepit leather skin. It constantly emits light in a @Template[type:cone|distance:60] (and dim light in the next 60 feet). You can close or open internal shutters with an Interact action to block or reveal the light.

Activate 2 Interact

Frequency once per day

Effect You slide in a magical lens that causes the lantern to emit a pale green light and then aim the lantern. All creatures in the lantern's @Template[type:cone|distance:60] of bright light (but not those in the dim light), must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:23|name:Queasy Lantern|traits:uncommon|showDC:all] save. On a failure, a creature becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Sickened]{Sickened 1} (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Sickened]{Sickened 2} on a critical failure). The light then reverts to normal as the lens slides out of place.
